text: And Quiet Flows the Don () is a 1931 Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pravov and Olga Preobrazhenskaya.Изгнана из дома, из кино. Роковая судьба любимой Аксиньи Михаила ШолоховаЗа что ругают «Тихий Дон» Сергея Урсуляка: суетливость, ляпы и театральность The movie is an adaptation of the first two books of the eponymous novel by Mikhail Sholokhov. It stars Nikolay Podgorny, Andrei Abrikosov, and Emma Tsesarskaya. == Actors == * Nikolay Podgorny as Pantelej Prokofievich Melekhov * Andrei Abrikosov as Grigori Pantelejevich Melekhov * Emma Tsesarskaya as Aksinya Astagova * Raisa Puzhnaya as Natalya Koshonova * Aleksandr Gromov as Petr Melekhov * Georgi Kovrov as Stepan Astakhov * Yelena Maksimova as Daria Melekhova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1931 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pravov Category:Movies directed by Olga Preobrazhenskaya
